model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I just tried this breathing exercise and it really helped me relax.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'reminiscing past events', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A and B recall past events like ordering pizza and discovering a park.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors B: That's really cool, I'm happy for you. Speaking of things we've learned, do you remember when you ordered that pizza for me a few years ago? ### Neighbors A: Yes, of course! What about it? ### Neighbors B: It was so thoughtful of you. I still remember how delicious it was. ### Neighbors A: I'm glad you enjoyed it. Although, looking back, I can't believe I ordered a large cheese pizza with extra sauce. That's so much cheese! ### Neighbors B: It was a lot, haha. Speaking of things that happened in the past, do you remember that time you pushed my shoulder because you wanted me to accept you? ### Neighbors A: Oh no, that was so embarrassing. I still cringe when I think about it. ### Neighbors B: Don't worry about it, it was a long time ago. Besides, we're good friends now, so it all worked out. ### Neighbors A: You're right. And hey, speaking of being friends, do you remember when we found that park a couple of years ago? That was such a great day. ### Neighbors B: Yes! We played frisbee and had a picnic. It was so much fun. ### Neighbors A: I miss those days sometimes. It feels like life was simpler back then.' }
```
